title: New: The 1975 – Is There Somebody Who Can Watch You (Dream Koala Remix)
content:
Having seen The 1975 play just last night, I was secretly hoping for them to play two of the slower tracks from their recently released number one album; Menswear (my personal favourite) and the albums closing track, Is There Somebody Who Can Watch You.

Sadly, neither track featured, however Dream Koala has just released this rather stunning rework of the aforementioned Is There Somebody… transforming it into an almost classic late 90’s/early 00’s R&B style jam, without losing any of the emotional poignancy. Check out the remix below, and the original underneath that.
